an5.140:4.1: * “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato rañño nāgo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo, rañño aṅgaṃtveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
an5.140:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo sotā ca hoti, hantā ca, rakkhitā ca, khantā ca, gantā ca.
an5.140:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo sotā hoti?
an5.140:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo yamenaṃ hatthidammasārathi kāraṇaṃ kāreti—
an5.140:5.3: yadi vā katapubbaṃ yadi vā akatapubbaṃ—
an5.140:5.4: taṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto suṇāti.
an5.140:5.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo sotā hoti.
an5.140:6.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo hantā hoti?
an5.140:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo saṅgāmagato hatthimpi hanati, hatthāruhampi hanati, assampi hanati, assāruhampi hanati, rathampi hanati, rathikampi hanati, pattikampi hanati.
an5.140:6.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo hantā hoti.
an5.140:7.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo rakkhitā hoti?
an5.140:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo saṅgāmagato rakkhati purimaṃ kāyaṃ, rakkhati pacchimaṃ kāyaṃ, rakkhati purime pāde, rakkhati pacchime pāde, rakkhati sīsaṃ, rakkhati kaṇṇe, rakkhati dante, rakkhati soṇḍaṃ, rakkhati vāladhiṃ, rakkhati hatthāruhaṃ.
an5.140:7.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo rakkhitā hoti.
an5.140:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo khantā hoti?
an5.140:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo saṅgāmagato khamo hoti sattippahārānaṃ asippahārānaṃ usuppahārānaṃ pharasuppahārānaṃ bheripaṇavasaṅkhatiṇavaninnādasaddānaṃ.
an5.140:8.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo khantā hoti.
an5.140:9.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo gantā hoti?
an5.140:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo yamenaṃ hatthidammasārathi disaṃ peseti—
an5.140:9.3: yadi vā gatapubbaṃ yadi vā agatapubbaṃ—
an5.140:9.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo gantā hoti.
an5.140:10.1: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño nāgo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo, rañño aṅgantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
an5.140:11.1: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassa.
an5.140:11.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sotā ca hoti, hantā ca, rakkhitā ca, khantā ca, gantā ca.
an5.140:12.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye desiyamāne aṭṭhiṅkatvā manasi katvā sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti.
an5.140:12.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sotā hoti.
an5.140:13.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāseti, pajahati vinodeti hanati byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti;
an5.140:13.3: uppannaṃ byāpādavitakkaṃ … pe … uppannaṃ vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ … pe … uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme nādhivāseti, pajahati vinodeti hanati byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti.
an5.140:13.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hantā hoti.
an5.140:14.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
an5.140:14.3: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati;
an5.140:14.6: Sotena saddaṃ sutvā … ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyitvā … jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā … kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusitvā … manasā dhammaṃ viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
an5.140:14.7: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ manindriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati;
an5.140:14.10: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu rakkhitā hoti.
an5.140:15.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassa jighacchāya pipāsāya ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānaṃ;
an5.140:15.3: duruttānaṃ durāgatānaṃ vacanapathānaṃ uppannānaṃ sārīrikānaṃ vedanānaṃ dukkhānaṃ tibbānaṃ kharānaṃ kaṭukānaṃ asātānaṃ amanāpānaṃ pāṇaharānaṃ adhivāsakajātiko hoti.
an5.140:15.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khantā hoti.
an5.140:16.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yā sā disā agatapubbā iminā dīghena addhunā, yadidaṃ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ, taṃ khippaññeva gantā hoti.
an5.140:16.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gantā hoti.
an5.140:17.1: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti … pe … anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassā”ti.
